data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ellenrieder, Natalia Von, Garrison, Rosser W. (2008): Drepanoneura gen. nov. for Epipleoneura letitia and Protoneura peruviensis, with descriptions of eight new Protoneuridae from South America (Odonata: Protoneuridae). Zootaxa 1842: 1-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183222
